Module Fit_Diet_Planner
Package object

Class Sport

java.lang.Object
object.LibraryItem
object.Sport
public class Sport extends LibraryItem
Represents a physical activity stored in the library.

A Sport is a specific type of LibraryItem that stores the activity's MET (Metabolic Equivalent of Task) value and the default average seconds per repetition for rep-based exercises.

  • Method Details

    • validate

      public void validate()
      Validates this sport object to ensure its values are valid.

      This includes checking that the name is not empty, the met value is greater than zero, and if rep-based, secondsPerRep is also greater than zero.

      Specified by:
      validate in class LibraryItem
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if validation fails

    • getDisplayCategory

      public String getDisplayCategory()
      Returns the display category of this sport.

      If the sport is rep-based, returns "Rep-based"; otherwise returns "Time-based".

      Specified by:
      getDisplayCategory in class LibraryItem
      Returns:
      the display category as a string

    • generateDescription

      public String generateDescription()
      Generates a description of this sport with its details.

      For rep-based sports, includes the seconds per rep. For time-based sports, includes the MET value.

      Specified by:
      generateDescription in class LibraryItem
      Returns:
      a description string of this sport
